#Minutes Played
KobeBryant_MP <- c(3277,3140,3192,2960,2835,2779,2232,3013,177,1207)

DwightHoward_MP <- c(3021,3023,3088,2821,2843,2935,2070,2722,2396,1223)

# Vizualizing Subsets ----


Data <- MinutesPlayed[1:3,]

matplot(t(Data), type="b", pch=15:18, col=c(1:4,6))
